bug.short_desc: Set up Infrastructure to Deploy qooxdoo.org. .css and (q) Plugins

long_desc.thetext: We need a way to modify and deploy the resources used on our online systems (wiki, blog, bugzilla, ...). Most prominently this affects style sheets (.css) which may be generated from .less files, and the (q) plugins used on the homepage.

Did an initial check-in of online files in our repo, unde tool/admin/www.
master: bab4a98
Need to install node/lessc on our staging host.
For the qooxdoo manual, bug#6614 is relevant.

The assets from resources.qooxdoo.org are now maintained as follows:
- All are kept in the main qooxdoo git repository, root path tool/admin/www/resources. Subfolders are handled as follows.
- stylesheets/ Contains static files maintained in place, and generated output from files maintained in scss/. This folder and its contents is published to the web sites and manual source.
- scss/ SASS files to generate the main style sheets from in stylesheets/. This folder is not published anywhere.
- javascripts/ Contains .js files, both static which are maintained in place, as well as copies of files maintained in q.websites/.
- q.websites/ A qx.Website-style skeleton with a custom q library definition. Lib in script/, custom q code in source/, unit tests in test/. This should be the place where our custom q code is maintained, and then copied to javascripts/.
The tech manual [1] has all the details.
[1] https://github.com/qooxdoo/qooxdoo/blob/master/documentation/tech_manual/source/pages/project/resources.qooxdoo.org.rst
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
